name: Drop A Hint For WooCommerce
author: Dropahint

sections.description:
Drop A Hint 2.0 is an innovative and unique conversion app in the WordPress and Woocommerce Ecosystem used by dozens of global brand names. With Drop A Hint 2.0 you will engage your online “window” shopper and turn them in your best brand advocates via Email, SMS, TikTok, WhatsApp and Messenger.

Drop A Hint 2.0 is fully Shopify integrated compatible with Shopify Store 2.0 with

Some Key Features:

Target visitors with relevant messages based on their interaction with your brand in the past. Send tailored messages to drive first-time customer sales

Powerful pre-built Integrations and Automations

Save time, increase conversion and ROI (return of investment) by quick and easy set up of:

  • Automated follow-ups with behavior triggers and webhooks.
  • Coupon Automation linked to your product, collections etc.
  • Integration with Klaviyo, Pirvy, Omnisend, and Mailchimp for automated import of user emails and marketing automation

Design Stunning Hint Cards to share via Email, SMS, TikTok, WhatsApp, and Messenger

  • Fully Customizable
  • Very intuitive and easy to use Hint Card Composer
  • Independent Mobile Hint Card Composer
  • 100% responsive with dynamic tags for product image, variants, etc
  • Custom message box

Powerful in-depth analytics to better understand and target your visitors

  • User Activity will give you insights into their interaction with your brand
  • Most Sold Items data
  • Most Hinted Items data

Q&A

  • I just installed the app. The app is asking me to approve charges. Will my account be charged immediately?
  1. You will have to approve the charge to install the app. Your account will NOT be charged until your trial period expires.

* Do I have to configure my store’s theme for this app?
1. Unlike other apps, you don’t have to edit your store’s theme. Drop A Hint 2.0 is a one-click installation.
* Can I modify the design of the Hint Card for desktop and mobile?
1. Yes, Drop A Hint 2.0 is fully customizable with no coding skills required

Install Now for a 100% Risk-Free Trial

Try the App in Action! Install Now For A 100% Risk Free Trial
sections.installation:
1. Install Drop A Hint plugin either via the WordPress.org plugin directory or download plugin then unzip the contents of dropahint.zip
  2. Move Drop A Hint folder inside your wordpress’s ‘wp-content/plugins’ folder.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  4. You will now see Drop A Hint menus in your wordpress admin section, open that dropahint menu.
  5. Login to your dropahint account and brand your hint cards to anything you want. You are done! Now you are ready to sell more.
